message.content: We're building a self-evolving agent documentation for a codebase. The goal is to use RLMs to leverage huge context windows. Can you build this example? You can assume some patterns using regex to make sure each subagent only gets one code file
but what query do I input?

Console Error RLM Error: "Exit code -1: " components/rlm/rlm-chat.tsx (57:21) @ RLMChat.useRLM 55 | }, 56 | onError: (error) => { > 57 | console.error('RLM Error:', error); | ^ 58 | }, 59 | }); 60 | Call Stack 5 Show 3 ignore-listed frame(s) RLMChat.useRLM components/rlm/rlm-chat.tsx (57:21) useRLM.useCallback[execute] hooks/use-rlm.ts (87:37) And we need as output a .md file
